#include<bits/stdc++.h>
#define ll long long
#define fi first
#define se second
ll mpow(ll a, ll n,ll mod)
{ll ret=1;ll b=a;while(n) {if(n&1)
    ret=(ret*b)%mod;b=(b*b)%mod;n>>=1;}
return (ll)ret;
}
using namespace std;
#define mem(x,a) memset(x,a,sizeof(x))
#define pii pair<int,int>
#define mp make_pair
#define pb push_back
#define all(v) v.begin(),v.end()
using namespace std;
#define N (int)(1e4+4)
vector<int> v(6);
void solve(){
    string s;
    int k,sz,sum=0,sum2=0;
    cin>>s>>k;
    int t=100;
    v[0]=1;
    v[1]=3;
    v[2]=2;
    v[3]=6;
    v[4]=4;
    v[5]=5;
    while(t--){
        s.insert(s.begin(),'0');
    }
    string T=s;
    reverse(T.begin(),T.end());
    for(int i=0;i<s.size();i++){
            sum+=(s[i]-'0');
    }
    for(int i=0;i<T.size();i++){
        sum2+=(T[i]-'0')*v[i%6];
    }
    sz=s.size();
    if(k==1)
        printf("YES");
    if(k==2){
        if(s[sz-1]=='0'||s[sz-1]=='2'||s[sz-1]=='4'||s[sz-1]=='6'||s[sz-1]=='8')
            printf("YES");
        else
            printf("NO");
    }
    if(k==3){
        if(sum%3==0)
            printf("YES");
        else
            printf("NO");
    }
    if(k==4){
        if(((s[sz-2]-'0')*10+s[sz-1]-'0')%4==0)
            printf("YES");
        else
            printf("NO");
    }
    if(k==5){
        if(s[sz-1]=='0'||s[sz-1]=='5')
            printf("YES");
        else
            printf("NO");
    }
    if(k==6){
        if((s[sz-1]-'0')%2==0&&sum%3==0)
            printf("YES");
        else
            printf("NO");
    }
    if(k==7){
        if(sum2%7==0)
            printf("YES");
        else
            printf("NO");
    }
    if(k==8){
        if(((s[sz-3]-'0')*100+(s[sz-2]-'0')*10+(s[sz-1]-'0'))%8==0)
            printf("YES");
        else
            printf("NO");
    }
    if(k==9){
        if(sum%9==0)
            printf("YES");
        else
            printf("NO");
    }
    if(k==10){
        if(s[sz-1]=='0')
            printf("YES");
        else
            printf("NO");
    }
    printf("\n");
}
int main(){
   //ios_base::sync_with_stdio(false);
   int t=1;
   cin>>t;
   for(int i=1;i<=t;i++){
       //printf("Case #%d: ",i);
       solve();
   }
   return 0;
}
